alert.note: Alert for Lac qui Parle; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 4:16PM CDT until May 31 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lac qui Parle County in west central Minnesota... Central Yellow Medicine County in west central Minnesota... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Cottonwood, or 13 miles north of Marshall, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Clarkfield around 430 PM CDT. Boyd around 435 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
